name: Malicious PowerView PowerShell Commandlets
description: Detects Commandlet names from PowerView of PowerSploit exploitation framework.
false_positives: Should not be any as administrators do not use this tool
query: powershell.file.script_block_text:(/.*[Ee][Xx][Pp][Oo][Rr][Tt]\-[Pp][Oo][Ww][Ee][Rr][Vv][Ii][Ee][Ww][Cc][Ss][Vv].*/ OR /.*[Gg][Ee][Tt]\-[Ii][Pp][Aa][Dd][Dd][Rr][Ee][Ss][Ss].*/ OR /.*[Rr][Ee][Ss][Oo][Ll][Vv][Ee]\-[Ii][Pp][Aa][Dd][Dd][Rr][Ee][Ss][Ss].*/ OR /.*[Cc][Oo][Nn][Vv][Ee][Rr][Tt]\-[Nn][Aa][Mm][Ee][Tt][Oo][Ss][Ii][Dd].*/ OR /.*[Cc][Oo][Nn][Vv][Ee][Rr][Tt][Tt][Oo]\-[Ss][Ii][Dd].*/ OR /.*[Cc][Oo][Nn][Vv][Ee][Rr][Tt]\-[Aa][Dd][Nn][Aa][Mm][Ee].*/ OR /.*[Cc][Oo][Nn][Vv][Ee][Rr][Tt][Ff][Rr][Oo][Mm]\-[Uu][Aa][Cc][Vv][Aa][Ll][Uu][Ee].*/ OR /.*[Aa][Dd][Dd]\-[Rr][Ee][Mm][Oo][Tt][Ee][Cc][Oo][Nn][Nn][Ee][Cc][Tt][Ii][Oo][Nn].*/ OR /.*[Rr][Ee][Mm][Oo][Vv][Ee]\-[Rr][Ee][Mm][Oo][Tt][Ee][Cc][Oo][Nn][Nn][Ee][Cc][Tt][Ii][Oo][Nn].*/ OR /.*[Ii][Nn][Vv][Oo][Kk][Ee]\-[Uu][Ss][Ee][Rr][Ii][Mm][Pp][Ee][Rr][Ss][Oo][Nn][Aa][Tt][Ii][Oo][Nn].*/ OR /.*[Ii][Nn][Vv][Oo][Kk][Ee]\-[Rr][Ee][Vv][Ee][Rr][Tt][Tt][Oo][Ss][Ee][Ll][Ff].*/ OR /.*[Rr][Ee][Qq][Uu][Ee][Ss][Tt]\-[Ss][Pp][Nn][Tt][Ii][Cc][Kk][Ee][Tt].*/ OR /.*[Gg][Ee][Tt]\-[Dd][Oo][Mm][Aa][Ii][Nn][Ss][Pp][Nn][Tt][Ii][Cc][Kk][Ee][Tt].*/ OR /.*[Ii][Nn][Vv][Oo][Kk][Ee]\-[Kk][Ee][Rr][Bb][Ee][Rr][Oo][Aa][Ss][Tt].*/ OR /.*[Gg][Ee][Tt]\-[Pp][Aa][Tt][Hh][Aa][Cc][Ll].*/ OR /.*[Gg][Ee][Tt]\-[Dd][Nn][Ss][Zz][Oo][Nn][Ee].*/ OR /.*[Gg][Ee][Tt]\-[Dd][Oo][Mm][Aa][Ii][Nn][Dd][Nn][Ss][Zz][Oo][Nn][Ee].*/ OR /.*[Gg][Ee][Tt]\-[Dd][Nn][Ss][Rr][Ee][Cc][Oo][Rr][Dd].*/ OR /.*[Gg][Ee][Tt]\-[Dd][Oo][Mm][Aa][Ii][Nn][Dd][Nn][Ss][Rr][Ee][Cc][Oo][Rr][Dd].*/ OR /.*[Gg][Ee][Tt]\-[Nn][Ee][Tt][Dd][Oo][Mm][Aa][Ii][Nn].*/ OR /.*[Gg][Ee][Tt]\-[Dd][Oo][Mm][Aa][Ii][Nn].*/ OR /.*[Gg][Ee][Tt]\-[Nn][Ee][Tt][Dd][Oo][Mm][Aa][Ii][Nn][Cc][Oo][Nn][Tt][Rr][Oo][Ll][Ll][Ee][Rr].*/ OR /.*[Gg][Ee][Tt]\-[Dd][Oo][Mm][Aa][Ii][Nn][Cc][Oo][Nn][Tt][Rr][Oo][Ll][Ll][Ee][Rr].*/ OR /.*[Gg][Ee][Tt]\-[Nn][Ee][Tt][Ff][Oo][Rr][Ee][Ss][Tt].*/ OR /.*[Gg][Ee][Tt]\-[Ff][Oo][Rr][Ee][Ss][Tt].*/ OR note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`powershell.file.script_block_text:(*Export\-PowerViewCSV* OR *Get\-IPAddress* OR *Resolve\-IPAddress* OR *Convert\-NameToSid* OR *ConvertTo\-SID* OR *Get\-NetLocalGroup* OR *Get\-NetLocalGroupMember* OR *Get\-NetShare* OR *Get\-NetLoggedon* OR *Get\-NetSession* OR *Get\-LoggedOnLocal* OR *Get\-RegLoggedOn* OR *Get\-NetRDPSession* OR
